notes: Modern, clean apartment with updated fixtures including split AC, modern kitchen with gas stove and stainless steel refrigerator. At least 2 bedrooms visible with built-in wardrobes. Good natural light from windows in living room and bedrooms. For baby safety: no visible balconies or concerning railings, windows appear to have bars/grilles on at least one bedroom, furniture has relatively rounded corners. Being on 2F of a 9-floor building strongly suggests elevator access.
